system.note: Stryxis (xenos) weapon. Blast ignores Armour and Toughness, no damage to non-living objects, Daemons, or Machines (Machine (5+) Trait). Blocked by untouchables and wards. Can't be used in launchers.

description.value:
Special: Blast (4)

Note: Stryxis (xenos) weapon. Blast ignores Armour and Toughness, no damage to non-living objects, Daemons, or Machines (Machine (5+) Trait). Blocked by untouchables and wards. Can't be used in launchers.
